summary: Adds recipes to smelters to turn human and troll skulls to bone meal. 4 units are created per 1 human skull and 12 units are created per 1 troll skull. The recipes will only show up if you have the corresponding components in your inventory.
descriptionHtml: Adds recipes to smelters to turn human and troll skulls to bone meal. 4 units are created per 1 human skull and 12 units are created per 1 troll skull. The recipes will only show up if you have the corresponding components in your inventory.
author: spiderexpert
